name: Real-Time Card Status Update Automation via Chatbot
description: This automation pattern provides a real-time status update for card requests to customers via a chatbot interface. It involves pulling status information from a card management system and displaying it through a chatbot using an API session.
input_requirements: access to card management system API
tech_stack: Chatbot Framework like Dialogflow or Microsoft Bot Framework

banned_tools: avoid using insecure or non-compliant chatbot platforms for financial data
required_integrations: possible integration with CRM systems for enriched customer interactions

llm_recommended_approach: Implement a microservice that queries the card management system's API for card status updates. The service should push updates to a chatbot interface in real time using webhooks or APIs. Ensure all data is encrypted and authenticated to maintain security and compliance.
